mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_REQUEST values (ORDER_SEQ.nextval, #{order_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mem_id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mem_address1, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mem_address2, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mem_address3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{order_state, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{deliveryCost, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{usePoint, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, sysdate)
insert into ORDER_ITEM(ORDERITEM_ID, ORDER_ID, PD_NUM, ORDER_STOCK) select order_product_seq.nextval, #{order_id, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, pd_num, cart_stock from CART
mapper.select: select PD_NUM, PD_NAME, PD_DISCOUNT from PRODUCT where PD_NUM = #{pd_num, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
